T02D1204:271b-1: shr'i aa na bi la n'a ma tantra panytsi ka /
T02D1204:271b-3: dpal rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa /
T02D1204:272a-1: pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1204:272a-2: bcom ldan rnyog pa med pa la //
T02D1204:272a-4: gzhon nu zla bas dri med pa //
T02D1204:272a-5: 'dir ni ji bzhin brtsam par bya //
T02D1204:272a-6: rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1204:272a-7: rnyog pa ni yid la byed pa'i rnyog pa'o //
T02D1204:272a-8: de yang ma rig pa dang bcas pa'i phung po ste /
T02D1204:272a-9: ma rig pa'i bag chags zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:272a-11: yid la byed pa'i rnyog pa spangs pas ma rig
T02D1204:272a-12: pa'i bag chags med pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1204:272a-13: / 'di bag chags dang bcas pa'i sdig pa ma
T02D1204:272a-14: lus pa spangs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D1204:272a-15: / ; /'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i
T02D1204:272a-16: sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa rab tu spangs
T02D1204:272a-17: pa'i ched du 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1204:272a-18: / ; to // ma rig pa'i bag chags dang
T02D1204:272a-19: bcas pa ni nyes pa thams cad kyi gleng gzhi
T02D1204:272a-21: gang la ma rig pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa
T02D1204:272a-22: med na de la ji ltar nyes pa'i bag chags
T02D1204:272a-24: de med na nyes pa gang zhig yod pa yin //
T02D1204:272a-25: de'i phyir rnyog pa med pa ste /
T02D1204:272a-26: sgrib pa gnyis bag chags pa thams cad med pa nyid do //
T02D1204:272a-27: rnyog pa de yang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1204:272a-28: brjod par bya ba bstan la /
T02D1204:272a-29: rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa ston to //
T02D1204:272a-30: phan 'dod pas zhes bya ba la rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob pa ni dgos pa ste /
T02D1204:272a-31: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba'i rdo rje 'dzin mdzad pa'o //
T02D1204:272a-32: de dag gis ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1204:272a-33: rnyog pa med pa de yang rnyog pa med pa'i
T02D1204:272a-34: khyab par snang ba med pa la sogs pa bye
T02D1204:272a-36: de la rnyog pa ni khams gsum gyi spros pa la dmigs pa thams cad de /
T02D1204:272a-37: de 'di la yod pa ma yin pas /
T02D1204:272a-38: snang ba med pa 'di ni spros pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D1204:272a-39: mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1204:272a-40: snang ba med pa ma yin pa ste /
T02D1204:272a-41: shes rab nyid snang ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don tam /
T02D1204:272a-42: 'di la snang ba med pa snang ba ma yin pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1204:272a-43: de la yod pa ma yin zhing /
T02D1204:272a-44: de rang nyid kyang med la /
T02D1204:272a-45: de'i rgyur yong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1204:272b-0: rnam pa gsum @272b du bshad pa'o //
T02D1204:272b-1: dpe med pa ni de dang mnyam pa'i gnyis pa
T02D1204:272b-2: gzhal bya med pa'i phyir dper nye bar gzhag pa
T02D1204:272b-3: med pas mnyam zhing mtshungs pa med pa ste /
T02D1204:272b-4: dpe med pa zhes bya ba'i don dang /
T02D1204:272b-5: de las gzhan pa'i gzhal bya med pa'i phyir /
T02D1204:272b-6: dpe med pa zhes bya ba'i don gyis de dang mnyam pa gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1204:272b-7: de'i bdag nyid kyis 'gro ba ste /
T02D1204:272b-8: 'gro ba de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1204:272b-10: brjod du med pa ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste /
T02D1204:272b-11: tshig gi spyod yul ma yin zhing rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i yul las 'das pas /
T02D1204:272b-12: rang yang dag pa'i rig pa tsam gyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyi phyir ro //
T02D1204:272b-13: brjod du med pa ma yin zhing brjod pa ma
T02D1204:272b-14: lus pa med pa nyid ces bya ba'i don te
T02D1204:272b-15: / brjod par mi nus pa dang /
T02D1204:272b-16: bstan du med pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:272b-17: yul gyi bdag nyid ma yin la /
T02D1204:272b-18: sangs rgyas kyi yang blo'i yul ma yin pa'i don to //
T02D1204:272b-19: rig pa mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1204:272b-20: yul gyi bdag nyid yod pa ma yin pa'ang 'di
T02D1204:272b-21: ni yul can rang bzhin med pas 'dzin pa'i don
T02D1204:272b-22: to // 'khrul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1204:272b-23: gzung ba med pas 'dzin pa med pa can ni /
T02D1204:272b-25: rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi rang bzhin ni /
T02D1204:272b-26: bcom ldan 'das ma 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad do //
T02D1204:272b-27: bzod pa nyid nas bzung ste ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D1204:272b-28: dri ma med pa ltos pa med pas ngo bo
T02D1204:272b-29: nyid kyi skyon thams cad sgrib g-yogs spangs pas nye
T02D1204:272b-31: gzod ma nyid nas ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:272b-32: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lus bstan to //
T02D1204:272b-33: glo bur gyi dri ma med pa yang gnyis te /
T02D1204:272b-34: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma med pa dang /
T02D1204:272b-35: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma med pa'o //
T02D1204:272b-36: de la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pas bdag med pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1204:272b-37: spangs ba phun sum tshogs pa brjod do //
T02D1204:272b-38: shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pas dag pa zhes bya ste /
T02D1204:272b-39: thob pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1204:272b-40: 'di dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis spangs pa dang /
T02D1204:272b-41: thob pa'i bye brag gis gnyis te /
T02D1204:272b-42: rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa ston to //
T02D1204:273a-0: de dag spangs pa ni rnam par mi rtog @273a * //
T02D1204:273a-1: pa'i zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D1204:273a-2: mtshan gzhi yang mtshon par bya ba'i dngos pos brtag
T02D1204:273a-3: par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam par rtog pa
T02D1204:273a-6: de nyid rang nyid gang gis kyang rtag par bya ba ma yin te /
T02D1204:273a-7: gzhan gyi rtog pa po yang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:273a-8: 'dis ni rtog pa dang bral ba bstan to //
T02D1204:273a-9: chos kyi sku la ltos nas kyang mtshon par bya ba'i dngos po yin pa dang /
T02D1204:273a-10: mtshan nyid kyis kyang gzugs kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang sku spangs pa'o //
T02D1204:273a-11: dang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don gyi rim pa bzhin du sbyar ba ste /
T02D1204:273a-12: de nyid snang ba med pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1204:273a-13: sogs pa khyad par gyi khyad par du byas pa'o
T02D1204:273a-14: // de nyid dpal rnyog pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D1204:273a-15: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ngo bo nyid
T02D1204:273a-16: kyi chos rnal 'byor ma'i de kho na nyid de
T02D1204:273a-17: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid can
T02D1204:273a-18: / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1204:273a-19: de skad du yang rgyal ba'i sras po de ni
T02D1204:273a-20: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i gzugs las ma mtshon
T02D1204:273a-21: pa'i chos las ma yin te /
T02D1204:273a-22: gang na sems med pa yid kyi rgyu ba med pa der /
T02D1204:273a-23: de ltar sangs rgyas dbyer med rjes su dran par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02D1204:273a-24: gang gis nga la gzugs su mthong //
T02D1204:273a-25: gang gis nga la sgrar thos pa //
T02D1204:273a-26: log par song la zhugs pa ste //
T02D1204:273a-27: skye bo de yis nga mi mthong //
T02D1204:273a-28: 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku //
T02D1204:273a-29: chos nyid du ni sangs rgyas lta //
T02D1204:273a-30: chos nyid shes par bya bar ni //
T02D1204:273a-31: rgyal bas kyang ni mi bskyod do //
T02D1204:273a-33: gzugs ni 'dir mtshan dang dpe byad do //
T02D1204:273a-34: chos nyid ni bstan pa'i chos so //
T02D1204:273a-35: sems ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bdun no //
T02D1204:273a-36: yid ni nyon mongs pa can gyi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs so //
T02D1204:273a-37: gzugs ni mtshan dang dpe byad kyis te /
T02D1204:273a-38: gnyis kas kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid la 'jug par byed pas spong ba ste /
T02D1204:273a-39: de kho na nyid ma yin par mthong bas thams
T02D1204:273a-40: cad 'dis spong bar byed pas chos rnams kyi chos
T02D1204:273a-41: nyid do // chos nyid ni chos kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D1204:273a-42: chos kyi sku ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1204:273b-0: shes par bya ba'i nye bar @273b mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1204:273b-1: gang rgyal bas kyang mi dpyod pa ni gang zhig
T02D1204:273b-2: blo'i yul ma yin pas gang yin pa mtshon par
T02D1204:273b-4: de dag gis chos kyi sku bshad do //
T02D1204:273b-5: phan pa'i sgras longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gnyis te /
T02D1204:273b-6: de dag gis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i phyir sku gsum bstan pa'o //
T02D1204:273b-7: sku gsum gyi tshig gis kyang 'di dag dbyer med
T02D1204:273b-8: par 'jug pa'i ye shes lnga bshad de 'di ni
T02D1204:273b-10: rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1204:273b-11: 'di nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1204:273b-13: rnyog pa med pa ni ma bslad pa yin pas ma bslad pa'i don to //
T02D1204:273b-14: gsal ba'i zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1204:273b-15: phan pa ni 'dir sku gsum nyid gang du yang bsam du yod pa ma yin te /
T02D1204:273b-16: gzung bya snang ba med pas 'dir 'dzin pa med de /
T02D1204:273b-17: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1204:273b-18: dpe med pa 'di ni rdo rje 'chang thob par byed pa'i lam gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1204:273b-20: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1204:273b-21: nang du yang bsam pa'i yul gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i don to //
T02D1204:273b-22: rgod dang bcas pas zhi ba'o //
T02D1204:273b-23: zhum pa dang rmugs pa dang gnyid med pas bdag med pa'o //
T02D1204:273b-24: 'gyod pa dang the tshom bral bas dag pa'o //
T02D1204:273b-25: mtshan gzhi bsam par bya ba dang /
T02D1204:273b-26: mtshan nyid sems par byed pa spangs pa ni bsam du med pa ste /
T02D1204:273b-28: sngar gyi snang ba med pa dang yul gyi bdag
T02D1204:273b-29: nyid dag las mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid spangs pa'i
T02D1204:273b-30: don 'di ni log pa yin te ;
T02D1204:273b-31: gang gi lam de gzhan gyis bsam gyi med pa dang /
T02D1204:273b-32: gzhan du sems pa ma yin pas snang ba med pa'i don to //
T02D1204:273b-33: de yang cung zad kyang yul yod pa ma yin te /
T02D1204:273b-34: yul med pas bdag yul gyi bdag nyid ma yin pa'i don to //
T02D1204:273b-35: gzhan sems pa ma yin pas gzhan gyi sgo nas tshig snga ma gnyis yin no //
T02D1204:273b-36: las 'dis yang rang nyid kyi kun du brtags pa'i dngos po med pas /
T02D1204:273b-37: rang nyid med pa'i don te /
T02D1204:273b-38: mtshan nyid med pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1204:273b-39: rang nyid rgyud la gnas pa'i kun du rtog pa med pa'i don te /
T02D1204:274a-0: rang gis brtag par bya ba ma yin pas mtshan nyid med @274a * //
T02D1204:274a-1: pa'i don gyis rang nyid kyang brtag par bya ba
T02D1204:274a-2: ni rang bzhin med par bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D1204:274a-3: // rgyun gyi snga ma dang phyi ma'i tshul gyis
T02D1204:274a-4: rgyun du gnas pa la bsam bya dang sems pa
T02D1204:274a-5: gnyis la rag las pa med pas na rang la
T02D1204:274a-6: sems pa dang bsam bya'i rang bzhin med de /
T02D1204:274a-7: rang gi sgo de ngag gi mtshan gzhi med pa dang /
T02D1204:274a-8: mtshan nyid med pa'i tshig dag go //
T02D1204:274a-9: rang gi sgo'i don gyis kyang gnyis su rig par bya ste /
T02D1204:274a-11: skad cig ma la ltos pas ni /
T02D1204:274a-12: rang dang gzhan gyi sgo nas byas pa'i khyad par ro //
T02D1204:274a-13: tshig 'di gnyis kyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lam gyi lus bstan pa ste /
T02D1204:274a-16: de nyid de ni bsam par bya ba min zhing bsam du med pa'o //
T02D1204:274a-17: 'on ci zhig bya snyam pa la /
T02D1204:274a-18: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ji
T02D1204:274a-19: ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sngon gyi smon
T02D1204:274a-20: lam gyi shugs kyis dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje
T02D1204:274a-21: chen pos de dang de ltar 'gro ba sna tshogs
T02D1204:274a-22: pa'i phan pa la dmigs nas /
T02D1204:274a-23: sprul pa rnams 'bad pa med par rang gis rab tu 'jug par bya ba nyid do //
T02D1204:274a-24: rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba ni mdzad pa'o //
T02D1204:274a-25: de kho na nyid la gnas nas rnam par mi
T02D1204:274a-26: rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin grub par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1204:274a-27: / lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor bas gnas par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:274a-28: kha cig ces bya ba la sogs pas ni mngon par mi 'dod pa 'gegs pa ste /
T02D1204:274a-29: stong pa nyid shin tu stong pa nam mkha'i me
T02D1204:274a-30: tog lta bu de dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs
T02D1204:274a-32: grag ces bya ba ni mi 'dod pa'o //
T02D1204:274a-33: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni stong pa la sogs pa bar ma chod pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1204:274a-34: rgyu'i zhes bya ba ni blos gzhag pa'o //
T02D1204:274a-35: 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa lhan cig
T02D1204:274a-36: skyes pa'i rdo rje 'chang thams cad du bsam gyis
T02D1204:274a-37: mi khyab pa'i chos dbyings kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1204:274a-38: ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin mthong ba'o //
T02D1204:274a-40: mngon du bya ba zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o //
T02D1204:274a-44: de dag ma grub pas lhan cig skyes pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1204:274b-0: @274b rdzogs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1204:274b-2: tshad mas bkag pas de dag nyid rang bzhin med pa 'di des brjod pa'o //
T02D1204:274b-3: 'bras bu la ltos nas rgyu yin la rgyu la ltos nas 'bras bu'o //
T02D1204:274b-4: ltos nas grub pa gang yin //
T02D1204:274b-7: bcom ldan 'das thog ma ste skye ba yin la ;
T02D1204:274b-9: gang la de dag med pas de nyid kyi rang
T02D1204:274b-10: bzhin gang yin pa de la de skad brjod de
T02D1204:274b-11: / rgyu dang rkyen dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1204:274b-12: mthong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya
T02D1204:274b-13: chen po 'di dngos grub kyi sprul pa ston pa
T02D1204:274b-14: yin te / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i mtha' las byung bas /
T02D1204:274b-15: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D1204:274b-16: chub mngon sum du bya ba'i rang bzhin chos thams
T02D1204:274b-17: cad sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pa nyid sgyu ma
T02D1204:274b-19: ye shes de bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rnam pa sna
T02D1204:274b-20: tshogs pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes 'byung ste
T02D1204:274b-21: / ye shes de dang ldan na de dang der sprul par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:274b-22: brtag pa ste nye bar brtags pa'i cha'o //
T02D1204:274b-23: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1204:274b-24: rdo rje can ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1204:274b-25: sogs pa'i sgras ni byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pas so //
T02D1204:274b-26: de dag gis brtags pa ste sprul pa 'gyed pa'o //
T02D1204:274b-27: da ni dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhag ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1204:274b-28: de la legs par gnas nas zhes bya ba la
T02D1204:274b-29: sogs pas bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam
T02D1204:274b-30: par gzhag pa re zhig ston to //
T02D1204:274b-31: legs par gnas pa ni gnas pa ste mi g-yo ba'o //
T02D1204:274b-32: the tshom la sogs pa'i skyon spangs pa'i don to //
T02D1204:274b-33: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa thog ma nas zhi ba dang /
T02D1204:274b-34: nam mkha'i mnyam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de'i chos thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1204:274b-35: rnam pa de'i spyod yul yin pas na yul te /
T02D1204:274b-36: dmigs pa'i chos thams cad gang yin pa de ni de bzhin du'o //
T02D1204:274b-37: chos zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'o //
T02D1204:274b-38: ngo bo nyid de rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba stong pa'o //
T02D1204:274b-39: gdod nas dag ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T02D1204:274b-40: rnyog pa med ces bya ba ni bshad pa ste /
T02D1204:274b-41: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i don to //
T02D1204:275a-1: gzhan la phan par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D1204:275a-2: de nyid kyis na sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1204:275a-3: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
T02D1204:275a-4: phung po la sogs pa ni rdul tshon gyi'o //
T02D1204:275a-5: sogs pa'i sgras ni skye mched do //
T02D1204:275a-6: khyad par ni rtogs pa'i khyad par ro //
T02D1204:275a-7: phung po la sogs pa mtshon par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1204:275a-8: lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1204:275a-9: phung po la sogs rnams la lus la sogs pa tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:275a-10: lus la sogs pa la gsum ma gtogs par khams
T02D1204:275a-11: dang skye mched rnams yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir
T02D1204:275a-12: te ; rdo rje gsum po nyid ni phung po dang skye mched dang khams kyi don to //
T02D1204:275a-13: de zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor de nyid do //
T02D1204:275a-14: brjod pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bstan to //
T02D1204:275a-15: de nyid kyis ni phung po la sogs pa bshad pas gnyis su med pa bstan te /
T02D1204:275a-16: sogs pa'i sgra ni gcig gis ni skye mched du gzung zhing gnyis pas ni khams te /
T02D1204:275a-17: zag pa dang bcas pa yang lam gyi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor du brjod do //
T02D1204:275a-18: 'bras bur gyur pas yang zag pa med pa'i dkyil
T02D1204:275a-19: 'khor 'di dag nyid zag pa med pa'i phung po
T02D1204:275a-20: rnams lta ba de la tshul khrims dang /
T02D1204:275a-23: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ni phung po'o //
T02D1204:275a-24: thod rgal la sogs pa ni skye mched la sogs pa'o //
T02D1204:275a-25: skye mched de byams pa la sogs pa'i khams rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid do //
T02D1204:275a-26: 'di dag ni rang bzhin bstan pa'o ;
T02D1204:275a-27: / me long lta bu la sogs pas ni gang
T02D1204:275a-28: gi phyir de ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par gyur
T02D1204:275a-29: pa ste / 'di ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bstan pa'o //
T02D1204:275a-30: ye shes bzhi ni rtsibs bzhir bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D1204:275a-31: rtsibs kyi sgra 'dis phyogs brdar btags pa'o //
T02D1204:275a-32: me long lta bu'i ye shes ni dang por shar gyi rtsibs so //
T02D1204:275a-33: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni lho'i rtsibs so //
T02D1204:275a-34: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni byang gi rtsibs so //
T02D1204:275a-35: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni nub kyi rtsibs te logs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:275a-36: de dag ni gru bzhi par brtags pa ste /
T02D1204:275b-0: @275b sangs rgyas thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pas so //
T02D1204:275b-2: mig gis de dang de'i rang gi yul du mthong bas so //
T02D1204:275b-3: spyod yul yang bstan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ram /
T02D1204:275b-4: ji srid du rang gi yul spyod pas gsungs so //
T02D1204:275b-6: sems dang chos bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste sgo'o //
T02D1204:275b-7: brjod ces bya ba la sogs pa ni gru bzhi ston pa ste /
T02D1204:275b-8: chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams pa dang /
T02D1204:275b-9: de dag bzhi sbyin pa ni gru bzhi ste /
T02D1204:275b-11: dbus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi snying por blta ste /
T02D1204:275b-12: chos kyi dbyings shing tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus so //
T02D1204:275b-13: 'di lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad lam gyi dus su nges par grub pa ste /
T02D1204:275b-14: nges par byas nas nyams su blangs nas /
T02D1204:275b-15: 'bras bu'i dus su nges par 'gyur ro //
T02D1204:275b-16: zhi ba'i chos ni lam bsdus pa ste /
T02D1204:275b-17: tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la
T02D1204:275b-18: sogs pa'i phung po lam la sgrib pa nye bar
T02D1204:275b-20: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ste /
T02D1204:275b-21: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa de dag nyid ni don te /
T02D1204:275b-23: de dag snying po yin pas na dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1204:275b-24: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa nyid kyis
T02D1204:275b-25: kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1204:275b-26: du bstan to // kun te dus gsum du yang
T02D1204:275b-27: grub pa ni lhan cig skyes pa drug pa ste
T02D1204:275b-29: zhi ba ni gdod nas zhi ba ste /
T02D1204:275b-30: ngo bo nyid kyis dri ma med pa la ltos pa dang /
T02D1204:275b-31: nyes pa thams cad nye bar zhi pa'o ;
T02D1204:275b-32: / chos te chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D1204:275b-33: de nyid don gyi dgos pa ste /
T02D1204:275b-34: ngo bo nyid kyi sku ste dra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa ste /
T02D1204:275b-35: ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag nyid dra ba la sogs pa'i bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D1204:275b-36: rta babs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag rgyas par bshad de ;
T02D1204:275b-37: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i mtha' phyin pa nyid ni rta babs so //
T02D1204:275b-38: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du byed pa med par 'jug pa nyid ni do shal te /
T02D1204:275b-39: 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1204:275b-40: gal te mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par 'jug pa la /
T02D1204:276a-1: 'du byed pa med pa ni dra ba phyed pa'o //
T02D1204:276a-2: brag ca lta bu thams cad kyi chos rtogs pa nyid dril bu'o //
T02D1204:276a-3: lhag par mos pa'i chos thams cad skyed pa ston pa nyid rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1204:276a-4: chos thams cad ni gnyis te /
T02D1204:276a-5: ston pa'i lung dang lhag par rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi tshul gyis so ;
T02D1204:276a-6: / dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i 'dzin pa las grol bas /
T02D1204:276a-7: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug cing khebs pa sems nyid bla re'o //
T02D1204:276a-8: da ni skad cig ma dang dga' ba bzhi bshad par bya'o /
T02D1204:276a-9: de la phreng ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas dge ba bstan te /
T02D1204:276a-10: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad cig la nye bar
T02D1204:276a-11: mtshon par dga' ba'i rang bzhin bde ba'i rnam pa'i
T02D1204:276a-12: snang ba nyid thams cad du phreng ba dang gos
T02D1204:276a-13: dang rnga yab la sogs pa'o //
T02D1204:276a-14: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mchog tu dga' ba'i ye shes te /
T02D1204:276a-15: rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma la mtshon pa'o //
T02D1204:276a-16: rdo rje padma rig pa la sogs pa'i dus su
T02D1204:276a-17: dga' ba bde ba'i rnam pa'i sems nyid kyis dga'
T02D1204:276a-18: ba rnams grvar son rdo rje'i don de'i zhes bya
T02D1204:276a-19: ba la sogs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa ste
T02D1204:276a-20: / de dag gis brtag par bya ba ma yin pa'i don gyis bems po ste /
T02D1204:276a-21: mtshan nyid dang bral ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1204:276a-22: lhan cig skyes pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya rnams ni bsgom par bya ba ste /
T02D1204:276a-23: rang gi cha'i rang bzhin ni bsgom pa ste bde mchog byung ba'o //
T02D1204:276a-24: bsgom pa las skyes pa'i bde mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:276a-25: mkha' 'gro ma ni bcom ldan 'das ma'o //
T02D1204:276a-26: sdom pa ni bcom ldan 'das te rdo rje sems dpa' 'am gzhan dag kyang ngo //
T02D1204:276a-27: de dag shar bas ni bzhengs pa ste mtshan nyid
T02D1204:276a-28: dang bral ba'i skad cig la lhan cig skyes pa
T02D1204:276a-29: nyid mkha' 'gro ma dang bde mchog shar bas dang
T02D1204:276a-31: grva dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dga' bral te /
T02D1204:276a-32: rdo rje ste rin po che ni nor bu ste
T02D1204:276a-33: bde ba la spyod pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas
T02D1204:276a-35: rnam pa med pa'i skad cig ma la dga' ba'i dga' ba rtogs pa nyid /
T02D1204:276a-36: gra ba'i mtshams thams cad du rdo rje rin chen
T02D1204:276a-37: gyis spras pa ste zur thams cad du nye bar
T02D1204:276a-38: mtshon pa nyid du padmo rnams 'dus te /
T02D1204:276b-0: @276b rdo rje rin chen spras pas mdzes pa nyid ni dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1204:276b-1: rdo rje rin po che'i tog go //
T02D1204:276b-2: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la don ni don dam pa de kho na nyid do //
T02D1204:276b-3: shes rab kyi de nyid mthong ba ni zla ba'o //
T02D1204:276b-4: thabs kyi de nyid mthong ba ni nyi ma'o //
T02D1204:276b-5: shes rab la sogs pa nye bar sdud pa ste /
T02D1204:276b-6: de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1204:276b-7: de ltar bshad ma thag pa ye shes ni thams cad rtogs pa'o //
T02D1204:276b-10: de dang de ltar rnam pa tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'o //
T02D1204:276b-11: de nyid bshad ma thag pa'i rtog pa thams cad
T02D1204:276b-12: de brjod pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo
T02D1204:276b-15: sbyin sreg ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1204:276b-16: rnam par mi rtog pa ste tha mal pa'i rtog pa ma lus par spangs pa'o //
T02D1204:276b-18: dpyod pa ste rang rang gi rang bzhin las so sor rtog par gyur pa ste /
T02D1204:276b-19: dngos po thams cad bdag nyid gang yin pa des dpyod pa'o //
T02D1204:276b-20: dngos po kun gyi 'joms par byed pa stong pa nyid kyi shes rab ces pa'i don to //
T02D1204:276b-21: rnam par 'byed pas dpyod pa ste rnam par phye ba nyid do //
T02D1204:276b-22: rang rang gi rnam par shin tu stong pa nyid me ste /
T02D1204:276b-23: dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad bsregs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1204:276b-24: bsreg par bya ba ni rang bzhin med par byed pa ste /
T02D1204:276b-25: de ltar rab tu gnas par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:276b-26: sems las byung ba ni sems kyis gzhag pa'o //
T02D1204:276b-27: gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po ni sems kyis sbyar ba ste ;
T02D1204:276b-28: sems las byung ba yang gzugs kyi skye mched la sogs pa'o //
T02D1204:276b-29: sogs pa'i sgras khams kyang ngo //
T02D1204:276b-30: rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1204:276b-31: dang po'i don gyi rkyen can no //
T02D1204:276b-32: brtan par gyur par sems mi g-yo ba ste /
T02D1204:276b-34: lus ngag yid kyi rnam pa de nyid ngo bo sems so zhes gsungs te /
T02D1204:276b-35: ston pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu'o //
T02D1204:276b-36: gcig tu gyur pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid do //
T02D1204:276b-37: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1204:276b-38: gsang chen gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi mtshan nyid ces nye bar bstan pa yin no //
T02D1204:277a-0: skye ba med cing snang ba @277a * //
T02D1204:277a-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nges par bstan pa ste /
T02D1204:277a-2: chos thams cad skye ba med pa gsang ba chen po'i don to //
T02D1204:277a-3: lha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang bzhin
T02D1204:277a-4: phung po nyid dang skye ba 'dzin pa nyid rigs
T02D1204:277a-5: so // des gang gnas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i blo
T02D1204:277a-6: la yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid de yang
T02D1204:277a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D1204:277a-9: brtags pa ste grub mthar byas pa'o //
T02D1204:277a-10: mtshon pa ste nges par ro //
T02D1204:277a-11: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po ste de nyid la yang dag pa'i byang chub bo //
T02D1204:277a-12: 'debs pa ni ro gcig par byed pa'o //
T02D1204:277a-13: lha rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1204:277a-15: sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin te zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ngo //
T02D1204:277a-16: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub sems bsgoms zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1204:277a-17: gsang chen ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D1204:277a-18: ae'i cha byad kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D1204:277a-19: mchog gi dgyes pa ni gzhal yas khang ste /
T02D1204:277a-20: rtag tu gnas pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
T02D1204:277a-21: bzhin gyi dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba'i tshul gyi
T02D1204:277a-22: phyir ro // sangs rgyas kun bdag ni ye shes
T02D1204:277a-23: gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin yon tan rnams nyid 'di
T02D1204:277a-24: la yod pas sems dpa' ste /
T02D1204:277a-25: bla na med pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:277a-26: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid do //
T02D1204:277a-27: sems dpa' ni snying rje ste de dag sbyar bas ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1204:277a-28: sku gang yin pa de gsungs pa /
T02D1204:277a-29: bde ba'i mchog ste bde ba chen po'i sku'o //
T02D1204:277a-30: gsang chen ni chos nyid do //
T02D1204:277a-31: mchog ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1204:277a-32: dgyes pa ni sna tshogs sprul pa'o //
T02D1204:277a-33: thams cad bdag nyid ni ngo bo nyid sku'o //
T02D1204:277a-34: rtag tu bzhugs pa ste sku bzhi bor nas gang du yang mi 'gro ba'o //
T02D1204:277a-35: sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid chos dang longs spyod dang sprul pa dang /
T02D1204:277a-36: ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i bdag nyid gang yin na sems dpa'o //
T02D1204:277a-37: de nyid gang zhe na rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1204:277a-38: de lta bu nyid gang bde ba'i mchog ste /
T02D1204:277a-39: bde ba chen po zhes pa sku lnga par brjod do //
T02D1204:277a-40: skyil krung zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnal 'byor gsungs te /
T02D1204:277b-0: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du @277b bsgom pa la /
T02D1204:277b-1: skad cig tsam gyis seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs nas
T02D1204:277b-2: skye ba ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa snying po'i rnal
T02D1204:277b-3: 'byor gyis bsgyings pa'i tshul du rdo rje dril bu
T02D1204:277b-5: khyab bdag dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du
T02D1204:277b-6: bdag bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgyu ma lta bu
T02D1204:277b-7: bsgom par bya'o ; / ji ltar sgyu ma lta bu bsgom pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1204:277b-9: gang dus gsum du 'byung ba'i ye shes skyes pa dang bskyed pa dang /
T02D1204:277b-10: skye ba la de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bskyed
T02D1204:277b-11: par bgyi yis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1204:277b-12: thams cad dang rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis
T02D1204:277b-13: bdag la byin gyis rlobs shig ces bden pa'i byin
T02D1204:277b-14: gyis rlabs brjod de gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1204:277b-15: thams cad de dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid bsgoms pa la brten par bya'o //
T02D1204:277b-16: de nas de la yang rtog par mi bya ste /
T02D1204:277b-17: bsam du med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis mngon par gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i man ngag go //
T02D1204:277b-18: 'jig rten pa'i don la rtog pa dang /
T02D1204:277b-19: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don la rtog pa ni gnyug ma ma yin te /
T02D1204:277b-21: gnyug ma ni gnyi ga'i rtog pa med pa'o //
T02D1204:277b-22: rang gi gnyug ma'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor gyis
T02D1204:277b-23: chos rnams la rnam par sbyor ba spangs pas gnas
T02D1204:277b-24: par bya'o // de kho na nyid rnam par mi
T02D1204:277b-25: rtog pa ni drug ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1204:277b-27: 'khor los gyur ba drug gis gzugs kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
T02D1204:277b-28: rigs drug kha sbyor bar gyur pa'i blos lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1204:277b-29: nam mkha'i khams thams cad khengs pa'i bla ma dang /
T02D1204:277b-30: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa mkhyen cing dgongs par bsams la /
T02D1204:277b-31: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /
T02D1204:277b-32: rnam par byang ba thams cad ji snyed pa sna tshogs kyi rtog pa spangs te /
T02D1204:277b-33: mdun gyi sangs rgyas de dag thams cad bsdus pa ni 'dus pa ste /
T02D1204:277b-34: rdo rje 'chang gcig tu gyur te /
T02D1204:277b-35: de dag gcig tu gyur pa'i sku can nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:278a-0: de la 'di bshad pa ni rang bzhin @278a * //
T02D1204:278a-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang ste /
T02D1204:278a-2: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa gcig gis gnas shing dgongs pa'o //
T02D1204:278a-4: 'di rgyas par bshad pa ni thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1204:278a-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin 'dus par gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1204:278a-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa gcig pa'i bdag po'o //
T02D1204:278a-7: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid do //
T02D1204:278a-8: yang gi sgras ni de kho na zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1204:278a-10: gang zhig sngon mar me mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs la /
T02D1204:278a-11: sh'akya thub pa ngas kyang bshad par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1204:278a-12: de nyid ces bya ba de nyid sngags kyi bstan
T02D1204:278a-13: bcos las rab tu sgrub pa go ku da ha
T02D1204:278a-14: na la sogs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i don
T02D1204:278a-15: to // 'di tsam gyis ni ba glang la sogs pa tshad bzung ba ste /
T02D1204:278a-16: gal te zhes bya ba gal te gang gi tshe
T02D1204:278a-17: yin na de'i tshe 'khor ba las khyad par du
T02D1204:278a-18: gyur pa bla na med pa rnal 'byor pa'i kun
T02D1204:278a-19: rdzob bo // don dam par bden par 'jog pa'i
T02D1204:278a-20: rgyu mchog tu yongs su dag pa 'dod pa'i yon
T02D1204:278a-21: tan ma lus pas 'dod par bya ba'i rgyur gyur
T02D1204:278a-23: gong na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1204:278a-24: mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshu rol 'khor ba nyid do //
T02D1204:278a-25: phung po bsnan pa ni med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1204:278a-26: da ni dam tshig sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs pa /
T02D1204:278a-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02D1204:278a-28: gang dang yang mi rtogs so //
T02D1204:278a-29: de la mos pa ni shin tu bstan pa bdun pa ste /
T02D1204:278a-30: mngon par yid ches pa des bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1204:278a-31: dam tshig gi don du 'jug pas so //
T02D1204:278a-32: 'dis mtshon par byed cing mngon sum byed pas na dam tshig ste /
T02D1204:278a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs lam gyi gnas skabs so //
T02D1204:278a-35: 'bras bu ster ba la mngon du phyogs par byed pa'am /
T02D1204:278a-37: mngon du bya ba 'di ni dam tshig ste /
T02D1204:278a-38: de nyid 'bras bu'i gnas skabs so //
T02D1204:278a-39: lam las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi 'bras bu med de /
T02D1204:278a-40: gser gyi tshogs snga ma la /
T02D1204:278a-41: 'di dag ni gser btsom [?] lta bu yin no //
T02D1204:278b-0: gang gi phyir lam @278b sgrib pa gnyis bag chags
T02D1204:278b-1: dang bcas pa thams cad rab tu spangs ba sgrib
T02D1204:278b-2: pa gnyis mthar thug gi bar gyi gnas skabs las
T02D1204:278b-3: pha rol nyid 'bras bur gyur nas mngon par gnas
T02D1204:278b-4: so // bsgrub bya ste mngon du phyogs par bya ba lam gyi gnas skabs la'o //
T02D1204:278b-5: mngon par byang chub pa yang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs la 'dir dngos grub ni mngon du bya'o //
T02D1204:278b-6: kla klo'i brdas tha snyad nyid de rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob nyid du'o //
T02D1204:278b-7: mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gsungs pa ste /
T02D1204:278b-8: mnyam pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jug pa ste /
T02D1204:278b-9: mnyam par sems can thams cad kyi thun mong pa dang /
T02D1204:278b-11: de la thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1204:278b-12: chags pa ni sems can thams cad la khyab pa'i snying rje chen pos chags pas ni chags pa'o //
T02D1204:278b-13: chos nyid ston pa ni ma chags pa'i yul gyi sems can nyid yod pa ma yin no ;
T02D1204:278b-14: / yod pa ma yin pa nyid ni mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i grub mtha'o //
T02D1204:278b-15: chos nyid la ni sems can dmigs par mi 'gyur la /
T02D1204:278b-16: de lta na yang snying rje de'i don byed pa'i don to //
T02D1204:278b-17: byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' ste /
T02D1204:278b-18: dang po nas bzhi pa'i sems can mthong ba de
T02D1204:278b-19: yang de'i don byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D1204:278b-20: go // 'o na snying rje nyid med de yul med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D1204:278b-21: yod de ji ltar byed ce na /
T02D1204:278b-22: de nyid re zhig sems can rang med na de
T02D1204:278b-23: yang sdug bsngal la sogs pa shin tu 'byung ngo
T02D1204:278b-24: zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba ste /
T02D1204:278b-25: bdag nyid rang mi shes ba de srid du rang
T02D1204:278b-26: gi sdug bsngal ba la sogs pas sdug bsngal bas
T02D1204:278b-27: phyin ci log tu byed pa'o //
T02D1204:278b-28: phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams la shin tu snying rjer 'jug pa'o //
T02D1204:278b-29: chags pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1204:278b-30: shes rab kyis chags pa'i snying rje rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1204:278b-31: spyang pa ste zos shing 'thungs pa ste rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:278b-32: chags chen ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi lus te /
T02D1204:278b-33: 'od dpag med ni mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams dngos po yod pa ma yin pas /
T02D1204:278b-34: tha dad pa'i blo gang la gang med pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D1204:278b-35: de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes snying po rin chen zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:279a-1: son pa ni rtogs pa ste de'i don du ye shes skye ba med pa ste /
T02D1204:279a-2: de ni so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i don te /
T02D1204:279a-3: chos ma skyes pa nyid so sor rtog pa snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1204:279a-4: yang chos de dpal rdo rje'i chos rnams so //
T02D1204:279a-6: bskyed pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D1204:279a-7: de ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1204:279a-9: rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1204:279a-10: chos rnams thams cad bde bar gshegs dang 'dra //
T02D1204:279a-11: byis pa'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa dag /'jig rten dag na med pa'i chos la spyod //
T02D1204:279a-13: skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1204:279a-14: de nyid bshad pa ni skye ba med pa ste /
T02D1204:279a-17: de ste chos rnams kyi rtogs pa'o //
T02D1204:279a-18: khu ba ste snang ba mtha' yas za ba ste /
T02D1204:279a-19: rang gis mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D1204:279a-20: mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa don yod grub pa ste /
T02D1204:279a-21: dngos po rnams te sems can rnams kyi dngos po rnams ni /
T02D1204:279a-22: gang don yod grub pas mnyam pa nyid de /
T02D1204:279a-23: sems can thun mong du 'jug pas 'dir btags nas
T02D1204:279a-24: mnyam pa nyid ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
T02D1204:279a-25: so // mnyam pa ni sems can thams cad kyi
T02D1204:279a-26: thun mong du bya ba nan tan grub pa'i dngos
T02D1204:279a-27: so // po la / brten pa'i ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D1204:279a-28: dngos po rnams ni phrag dog ste /
T02D1204:279a-29: dngos po zhes pa ni dngos po nyid kyi don to //
T02D1204:279a-30: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid don yod grub pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
T02D1204:279a-31: / sha ni bya sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag
T02D1204:279a-32: nyid don yod pa'i mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis
T02D1204:279a-33: zos pa ste / rang dbang du byed pa'o //
T02D1204:279a-34: yang ni dngos po rnams te sems can rnams la
T02D1204:279a-35: mi dmigs pa'i sbyor bas bya ba nyams su len
T02D1204:279a-36: pas sems can yang dmigs pa med ces bya ba'i
T02D1204:279a-37: don to // rab tu rgyas pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1204:279a-38: ji srid nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas klas pa ni rgyas pa'o //
T02D1204:279a-39: rab tu 'phro ba ni de dang de thams cad
T02D1204:279a-40: du 'gro ba'i sems can shin tu rnam par dag
T02D1204:279a-41: pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1204:279b-0: @279b rtogs pa ni mngon par bya ba ste /
T02D1204:279b-1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyis so //
T02D1204:279b-2: dam tshig ni thams cad 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings te /
T02D1204:279b-3: de nyid kyi don ni mngon par byang chub pa'i yul lo //
T02D1204:279b-4: de la gang dag sbyor ba las //
T02D1204:279b-5: zhes bya ba ni nye bar bgrod pa las so //
T02D1204:279b-6: dam tshig kyang shin tu dag pa'i ye shes mngon par byang chub pa'o //
T02D1204:279b-7: don yang chos kyi dbyings te mngon par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1204:279b-8: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i rnal 'byor ni ro gcig par son pa ste /
T02D1204:279b-9: de bdag nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:279b-10: de bas na chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par
T02D1204:279b-11: dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid mi bskyod pa
T02D1204:279b-12: nyid du zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:279b-13: mthun pa ni rang gi rgyud la 'jug par byed pa'o //
T02D1204:279b-14: las ni bya bar brjod de //
T02D1204:279b-15: ji bzhin pa'i don rtogs pa'o //
T02D1204:279b-16: de'i sbyor ba'i las ni yi dam dang rab tu sbyor ba'o //
T02D1204:279b-17: cung zad ces bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par snang mdzad bshad pa ste /
T02D1204:279b-18: cung zad med pa ni de dang 'di yin zhes
T02D1204:279b-19: nye bar 'jog pa'i rnam par 'gog pa'i sems ni
T02D1204:279b-20: me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D1204:279b-21: brten pa ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1204:279b-22: g-yo ba med par gnas pas rgyun du mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
T02D1204:279b-23: thun mong ma yin pa'i bdag nyid du snang bas mngon par snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
T02D1204:279b-24: de med pas mngon par mi snang ba ste /
T02D1204:279b-25: rtog pa nyid kyis sems kyi g-yo bas rnam par
T02D1204:279b-26: mi rtog pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes
T02D1204:279b-27: so // ma chad par snang ba dang /
T02D1204:279b-29: yul dang dus rnam par bcad pas gzhal bya nyung
T02D1204:279b-30: zad 'ga' zhig tu gsal ba de med pas me
T02D1204:279b-31: long lta bu'i ye shes ji srid du shes bya'i
T02D1204:279b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi mthar gtugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1204:279b-33: shes bya'i phung po mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi mthar gtugs par rab tu gsal ba'i don to //
T02D1204:279b-34: ma bsams par yang shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus par mkhyen pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1204:279b-35: gcig la yang cung zad kyang bsam pa med kyi /
T02D1204:279b-36: 'on kyang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1204:279b-37: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam
T02D1204:279b-38: par snang mdzad nyid sman chen po zhes bya ba'i
T02D1204:280a-0: don to // bza' ba ni bla na med pa'i @280a * //
T02D1204:280a-1: ye shes kyis tshim par byas pa'o //
T02D1204:280a-2: spangs pa'i don gyis de ma thag par rtog pa
T02D1204:280a-3: dang 'gal bar rtogs pa ni log par rtogs pa
T02D1204:280a-4: ste / rab tu 'byung ba ma yin pa bzhin no //
T02D1204:280a-5: de bzhin te log par rtogs pa med pa ni
T02D1204:280a-6: de dag gi de ma thag par ji bzhin pa
T02D1204:280a-7: rtogs pa'o // yang 'dir bshad ma thag pa'i rnam
T02D1204:280a-8: par snang mdzad kyi lus kyi yang rtog pa med
T02D1204:280a-9: rtogs pa'o // pa ste / dmigs su med pa'i ye shes kyis dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D1204:280a-10: de'i phyir gal te yang mnyam pa nyid de lam
T02D1204:280a-11: dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs mnyam par gyur kyang snga
T02D1204:280a-12: phyi la khyad par med do //
T02D1204:280a-13: de ltar sngar ni chos rnams me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis bstan la /
T02D1204:280a-14: da ni yang chos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T02D1204:280a-15: chos dad chos can gyi sgo nas tshig du phye ba'o //
T02D1204:280a-16: de dag ste gang du bshad ma thag pa'i dam tshig ni ji skad gsungs pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1204:280a-17: rtogs pa ni phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D1204:280a-18: rdo rje 'chad nyid kyi rnam pa gzhan gyi ming can zhes bya'o //
T02D1204:280a-19: mtshan nyid de nges par byas pa'o //
T02D1204:280a-20: de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa ni phan yon te /
T02D1204:280a-21: sangs rgyas kyi chos ni stobs dang /
T02D1204:280a-22: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi chos so //
T02D1204:280a-23: go 'phang so sor thob pa nyid ni thob par bya ba dang /
T02D1204:280a-24: rjes su bgrod par bya ba ste /
T02D1204:280a-26: dpal ni gnyis su med pa gsal ba ste chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1204:280a-27: de 'di la yod pas dpal ldan te /
T02D1204:280a-31: sku gsum mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:280a-32: de la bde ba ni des khyad par byed pa'i bde ba chen po'i sku'o //
T02D1204:280a-33: sku lnga'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1204:280a-34: 'bras bu mthar thug pa de'i rtogs pa ni gang gis mngon du byas pa dang /
T02D1204:280a-35: nges par byas pa gang yin pa de ni de lta bu'i rgyud do //
T02D1204:280a-36: gzhung ni lam ste 'bras bu mngon par rjod par byed pa'o //
T02D1204:280a-37: rnyog pa med pa nyid kyang dpal dang ldan pa
T02D1204:280a-38: bde ba chen po zhes gzhan gyi ming can no
T02D1204:280a-39: // rnyog pa med pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i 'grel ba rdzogs so /
T02D1204:280a-41: // / rnyog pa med pa'i dka' 'grel ni //
T02D1204:280b-0: @280b byas pa las skyes bsod nams gang //
T02D1204:280b-1: 'jig rten zla ba dri med gzhon nu bzhin //
T02D1204:280b-2: ma lus pa ru rnyog med shog / slob dpon
